Package com.brightywe.brightylist.task.controller

Class TaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightywe.brightylist.task.controller.TaskController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/tasks")
@PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_USER\', \'ROLE_PREMIUM_USER\')")
@CrossOrigin(origins="${value.frontend_url}")
public class TaskController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class TaskController as RestController of API for comunication with Front End. Responisible for managing request connected with tasks.
